Trade/Device Name(s): S TEST Reagent Cartridge Carbon Dioxide (CO2)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for S TEST Reagent Cartridge Carbon Dioxide for quantitative measurement of carbon dioxide in serum or plasma using the Hitachi Clinical Analyzer E40
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of carbon dioxide concentration in serum or lithium heparin plasma to aid diagnosis and treatment of disorders associated with acid-base balance, for use in clinical and physician office laboratories
